Package persistence

Class RepositorioCandidatura

java.lang.Object
persistence.RepositorioCandidatura
public class RepositorioCandidatura
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible for creating a repository to store information about applications.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
